thread.title: Suspect arrested for tossing flammable liquid at group
thread.title_full: Suspect arrested for tossing flammable liquid at group - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Suspect arrested for tossing flammable liquid at group
text:
NEW YORK (AP) - New York City police say they've arrested a suspect for allegedly tossing a flammable liquid and a burning rag at a group of men in midtown Manhattan.
Thomas Miles, of Queens, faces charges of attempted murder, attempted assault and criminal possession of a weapon.
The incident occurred last Friday. Police say Miles approached the group standing on West 37th Street and threw a glass bottle containing a flammable liquid and the burning rag in their direction.
Police say the bottle shattered and started a fire but no one was injured.
It wasn't immediately known if the 53-year-old Miles has an attorney who could comment on the charges.
